nodes.text: The Carlac Death Watch camp was erected by the Mandalorian splinter group Death Watch on the planet Carlac. During the Clone Wars, Death Watch leader Pre Vizsla met with Lux Bonteri, who came to Carlac with the Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano, to discuss Bonteri's plan for revenge on Count Dooku, who had murdered Bonteri's mother Mina. However, after witnessing the atrocities committed by the Death Watch against the native Ming Po, Tano revealed herself and fought Vizsla, eventually escaping with Bonteri.
